strings.string: Suspends (S3 / S1 depending on bios setting) the System
Run Python script. You must specify the full path to the script
Run AppleScript. You must specify the full path to the script
Plays a playlist, music/video-file, directory or an Url
Run a slideshow from the specified directory, including all subdirs
Will play the inserted CD or DVD media from the DVD-ROM drive
Execute shell commands and freezes XBMC until shell is closed
Update database. For "video" you can additionally specify a path to be scanned
This can delete your entire library if the source is not available!!!
Starts the screensaver(Future XBMC-Gotham(v13) addition) - not implemented
For further information see wiki: List of built-in functions
Notice: Service must be enabled in "Action on IDLE"-Window
